mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN alarm_type='req-pl' THEN 1 END) as reqPl, COUNT(CASE WHEN alarm_type='res-pl' THEN 1 END) as resPl, COUNT(CASE WHEN alarm_type='reply' THEN 1 END) as reply, COUNT(CASE WHEN alarm_type='posts' THEN 1 END) as posts, COUNT(*) as totalCnt FROM alarm WHERE mem_id = #{memId} AND UPPER(alarm_status) = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm ( alarm_id, alarm_cont, alarm_status, mem_id, alarm_type ) VALUES ( alarm_seq.nextval, #{alarmCont}, 'N', #{memId}, #{alarmType} )
